description: Creative Enzymes provides multiple enzyme screening services to customers worldwide. Relying on a team of outstanding scientist, we proudly present the screening service for identification of specific enzymes of interest. Based on the expertise, experience, and in-house database, we are able to develop and perform assays specially designed for target enzymes, which serves as the very first step in enzyme engineering, ligand design, and pathway regulation.
name: Identification of a Target Enzyme
